![](2025-images/Kaylee-Award-1.jpg){width="75%" fig-align="center"}

Kaylee Cheung's Undergraduate Research Symposium Presentation, "Comparing Two Systems for Measuring Infant Body Position", received the best presentation award for a student from the College of Natural and Agricultural Sciences. Ms. Cheung and Dr. Franchak attended a celebratory luncheon with the Vice Provost and Dean of Undergraduate Education, Louie Rodriguez, and other awardees.
